argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_negid | |- ( X e. CC -> ( X + -u X ) = 0 ) |
| 2 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( X e. CC -> -u X e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 4 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- CCfld e. Grp |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` CCfld ) = ( invg ` CCfld ) |
| 10 | 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_grpinvid1 | |- ( ( CCfld e. Grp /\ X e. CC /\ -u X e. CC ) -> ( ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` X ) = -u X <-> ( X + -u X ) = 0 ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( X e. CC /\ -u X e. CC ) -> ( ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` X ) = -u X <-> ( X + -u X ) = 0 ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 11 | #P_mpdan | |- ( X e. CC -> ( ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` X ) = -u X <-> ( X + -u X ) = 0 ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 12 | #P_mpbird | |- ( X e. CC -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` X ) = -u X ) |
